name: Christmas Fever! (itch)
description:
2D platformer. Holidays are approaching, so get in the Christmas mood by playing Christmas Fever! Explore a wonderful Christmas world with a Snowman and Santa's crew. Help Santa Claus collect coins for gifts. Avoid monsters and traps, collect gifts with specials powers to reach previously inaccessible places.

Special Powers:

- transformation into a snowball

- super speed

- dash jump

- wall walk

This is a demo of the game in development. You can already buy and play the 32 levels version from the Microsoft Store. New levels every two weeks!

Android version has ads.
